text.autoconfig.scnamelink.title: Spooncraft Name Link
text.autoconfig.scnamelink.option.replac: Use Nicknames in the Crew List
text.autoconfig.scnamelink.option.colour: Colour Names in the Crew List
Colour the Name Banners o' the Crew
Colour Names in the Pirate Chatter
text.scnamelink.status.disabled: SpooncraftNameLink be struck down n’ disabled.
text.scnamelink.status.working: SpooncraftNameLink be still settin' sail fer setup.
text.scnamelink.status.fallback: SpooncraftNameLink failed to reach the server. Usin’ cached fallback charts.
text.scnamelink.status.failure: SpooncraftNameLink be lost at sea — no server or fallback to be found!
text.scnamelink.status.success: Mappings loaded from the server’s hoard.
text.autoconfig.scnamelink.option.enable: Restart the game after hoistin’ this option.
text.autoconfig.scnamelink.option.apiLin: Leave this map blank if ye don’t know the way.
Restart the voyage game after chartin’ a new map.
